text: Men and Beasts () is a 1962 Soviet-German drama movie directed by Sergei Gerasimov.ЛЮДИ И ЗВЕРИ (1962)Люди и звери It stars Nikolai Yeremenko Sr., Tamara Makarova, and Zhanna Bolotova. == Actors == * Nikolai Yeremenko Sr. as Alexei Ivanovic Pavlov * Tamara Makarova as Anna Andreevna * Zhanna Bolotova as Tanya * Tatyana Gavrilova * Karla Assmus as Annemarie * Fredy Barten as Koch == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1962 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Gerasimov
title: Men and Beasts
